about_the_game:
One day, a towering Tree of Hope grew out of the Sea of Sorrows, and at the base of this tree a small island gradually formed, our Wish Island. You can write down your wishes in the game, and the spirits on the island will pray for them to come true.

“Some wishes are best kept in your heart.” If you don’t want others to always see your written wishes, you can switch them to encrypted runes.


The person who discovers this island becomes the master of Wish Island—that’s you. You can summon more spirits, expand and develop the island, and add various features like shops, fishing spots, farming, and more.

Since the island exists in another dimension, the island master can only interact with the various elements on the island through a beam of light. The spirits also rely on this light to feel the master’s care and attention.




The waters around the island are rich in resources, and the fertile soil is suitable for growing various crops. You can obtain these resources through fishing, farming, and trading in shops.

As you progress, you’ll unlock cooking and crafting features, allowing you to use these resources to create food and toys that the spirits love, enriching their lives. Their happiness and satisfaction will be your most valuable treasures, motivating them to pray even more earnestly for your wishes.




Praying is the spirits' innate duty, but they also enjoy their personal time after work, relaxing or playing freely in the small world you design.

With diverse personalities, they may become best friends or have tense relationships when they encounter each other on the island. In your spare time, you’ll need to look after the spirits' moods, drop beams of light to guide them through their troubles, or share in their moments of joy and satisfaction!




Day after day, the spirits will climb to the treetops to continue their prayers, while the island masters continue their lives in their own world.



If you’re working hard toward your wishes, you can summon the spirits to your desktop to accompany you during your busy times.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570T (dual-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-9590 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 270X (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 270X (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a "blessing" game designed to bring you good luck, combining idle mechanics, desktop pets, farming, fishing, and homebuilding. On this island born from your wishes, each adorable spirit will accompany you every day, offering sincere prayers for your heart's desires!
